edu.cooper

Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cooper.Road

  • public class Road
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a road. A road keeps track of the number of drivers using it. The travel time along a road is a function of the number of drivers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Road

        public Road(java.lang.String name,
    double freeflow_tt,
    double driverdependence)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the road. It should be specified as part of a road network. See the README for more details.
        freeflow_tt - The cost of the road when no drivers are on it
        driverdependence - A weighting factor for calculating the cost as a function of the number of drivers.

    • Method Detail

      • cost

        public double cost()
        Returns the travel time on this road as a function of number of drivers. Currently the travel time is a linear function of number of drivrs. traveltime(n) = freeflowtraveltime + driverdependence*n;
        Returns:
        this.freeflowtraveltime + this.driverdependence*this.num_cars

        Returns the number of cars currently on the road.

      • cost

        public static double cost(double freeflowtraveltime,
          double driverdependence,
          int num_cars)
        Returns the travel time on this road as a function of number of drivers. Currently the travel time is a linear function of number of drivrs. traveltime(n) = freeflowtraveltime + driverdependence*n;
        Parameters:
        freeflowtraveltime -
        driverdependence -
        num_cars -
        Returns:
        freeflowtraveltime + driverdependence*num_cars
